attributes.background: Despite the global ban on commercial whaling Japan has unilaterally decided to resume whaling in the Southern Ocean defying a ruling by the International Court of Justice that Japan should cease all whaling.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition in its current form as it does not include a clear call for action from either the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition asking the Government to take specific action. Alternatively, you might like to sign this petition, which we think is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/130995
